newsitem.title: USA: ADR REPORT - NY Euro ADRs little changed.
newsitem.headline: ADR REPORT - NY Euro ADRs little changed.

text.p: Most European American Depositary Receipts (ADRs) traded on Wednesday near their closing prices and Argentine shares were boosted by economic figures, traders said.
"We've had some good action. Most ADRs are a half-point from where they closed yesterday," one trader said.
Daimler-Benz stood out among European stocks. Its ADR traded up 1-3/4 to 65-7/8 after some investment houses repeated buy recommendations for the stock.
Dutch insurer Aegon NV rose 1-1/8 to 55-3/4 after analysts predicted its nine-month profit would increase 16.2 percent.
Among other European stocks, the Netherlands' Akzo Nobel NV rose 7/8 to 64-3/8 and British Biotech Plc was up two to 39.

Argentine stocks were boosted by an Economy Ministry report that the country's gross domestic product grew 6.6 percent in the third quarter compared with the same period in 1995. Telefonica de Argentina S.A. rose 3/8 to 25.
